describes.filter: The B30 track status filter to use.
describes.count: Number of songs to display in your best charts, instead of 30. Value between 1-50. ✨PREMIUM

calculate.name: Calculate
calculate.desc: Compute score for chosen chart. 39s exclusive!

describes.score: Your total in P/G/G/B/M format (supports greats only and G/G/B/M as well).

comics.name: Comics
comics.desc: Check in-game comics, as seen in loading screens.

border.name: Border
border.desc: Shows the current event border (highlight) rankings.

predict.name: Predict
predict.desc: Predict cut-offs for the current event. (sourced from jiiku831)

schedule.name: Schedule
schedule.desc: Shows the current and future event schedule.

view.name: View
view.desc: Check details for a specific rank.

describes.reverse_odds: Invert the odds for 2* and 4* cards.

describes.guess_type: Which guess type to fetch stats for.
describes.user: Which Discord user to check stats.
describes.lb_rank: Which rank to check stats for.

describes.guess_type: Which guess type to fetch a leaderboard for.

hint.name: Hint
hint.desc: Cheat a bit on your guess.

toggle.name: Toggle
toggle.desc: Switch guessing on/off in your server.

describes.on: States if guessing is on or off.

character.name: Character
character.desc: Guess a PJSK character from a cropped card.

character_bw.name: Character BW
character_bw.desc: Guess a PJSK character from a greyscale cut card.

chart.name: Chart
chart.desc: Guess a PJSK track from a cropped master chart.

chart_append.name: Chart Append
chart_append.desc: Guess a PJSK chart from a cropped append chart.

event.name: Event
event.desc: Guess a PJSK event from a cropped event background.

jacket.name: Jacket
jacket.desc: Guess a PJSK track from a cropped jacket.

jacket_smol.name: Jacket Smol
jacket_smol.desc: Guess a PJSK track from a 30px cropped jacket.

jacket_bw.name: Jacket BW
jacket_bw.desc: Guess a PJSK song from a greyscale cut jacket.

jacket_challenge.name: Jacket Challenge
jacket_challenge.desc: Guess a PJSK song from a greyscale 30px cut jacket.

notes.name: Notes
notes.desc: Guess a PJSK track by its note count on Master.

help.name: Help
help.desc: Bot info, including invite, TOS, privacy policy, and commands.

why_inappropriate.name: Why Inappropriate
why_inappropriate.desc: Check why some text is inappropriate for PJSK.

describes.text: Text to check, up to 255 characters.

progress.name: Progress
progress.desc: Check your PJSK progress! Shows APs, FCs, and Clears for ALL song levels in a difficulty.

view.name: View
view.desc: Check details for a specific player at this rank.

xp_for.name: XP For
xp_for.desc: Get XP needed for a certain level.

describes.level: Which level to compute XP for.
